name: Monster Mania (Mirrorstone Studios)
description:
Monster Mania is a 2D dungeon crawler with a twist.   You and the Monster share the same health. In order to stay alive, you must keep yourself and the Monster safe. Find out how to break the link to the Monster by progressing through the dungeon. This project was created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Controls:

W A S D - Move player

Left Click - Shoot laser

Right Click - Push

Left Shift - Dash
